      • getNameOfAdmittedTermState

        public String getNameOfAdmittedTermState()
        Description copied from interface: LanguageCapabilities
        In newer versions of Acrolinx, you can flag admitted terms separately from deprecated and valid terms. You can also customize the name of the admitted term status. Before using this method check LanguageCapabilities.isNameOfAdmittedTermStateCustomized() if the admitted terms name is customized.
        Specified by:
        getNameOfAdmittedTermState in interface LanguageCapabilities
        Returns:
        the name of admitted term state for this server instance.

      • isNameOfAdmittedTermStateCustomized

        public boolean isNameOfAdmittedTermStateCustomized()
        Description copied from interface: LanguageCapabilities
        Checks if name of admitted term state is customized. If the name is customized it is provided by LanguageCapabilities.getNameOfAdmittedTermState().
        Specified by:
        isNameOfAdmittedTermStateCustomized in interface LanguageCapabilities
        Returns:
        true, if name of admitted term state is customized
